titleInfo.title: C and D Safety Co. Job No. 38953

mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 3458) for an order placed by C and D Safety Company for 100 one color lobby cards that read "No Parking." Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
